Post.title: hexo  github
Post._content:
[imweb](http://imweb.io/topic/5848d4259be501ba17b10a9a)

---

hexo  Github  hexo 

## &
 hexo  git remote 

```js
cd blog
git remote
// origin
```

 origin  git init  git remote add origin github  origin  origin git remote 
```js
git init
// Initialized empty Git repository in ****/blog/.git/
git remote add origin git@github.com:lulua87/lulua87.github.io.git

git remote
// orgin
```

## 
 git add  git commit  git push  push  git push -u origin HEAD:HEAD origin  origin  -u  push  git push  github   github  master  master  hexo  git fetch origin  hexogithub 
```js
git add .
git commit -m 'submit sth'
git push -u origin HEAD:rawblog
```
## 
 github 

update github  hexo ~



## 

#### MacSSH-Key:

MacSSH-Keysshgithub
ssh-keygengithubgitlab

 ssh

sshkey
1. cd ~/.ssh
2. ssh-keygen -t -rsa -C 'github' -f id_rsa_lulua87
3. ssh -T git@github.com

Hi lulua87/lulua87.github.io! You've successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not provide shell access.
4. cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa_lulua87.pub | pbcopy
githubgithubblogDeploy keys add Deploy keys 
5. vi ~/.ssh/config
~/.ssh config
```js
# icode
Host ****
HostName ***
User 
PreferredAuthentications publickey
IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa

# github
Host github.com
HostName github.com
User git
PreferredAuthentications publickey
IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_lulua87
```

PS esc, :wq 

id_rasgithub.comid_ras_lulua87github.com(id_rsa_lulua87.pub)

#### hexohexo
```js
{ [Error: Cannot find module './build/Release/DTraceProviderBindings'] code: 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND' }  
{ [Error: Cannot find module './build/default/DTraceProviderBindings'] code: 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND' }  
{ [Error: Cannot find module './build/Debug/DTraceProviderBindings'] code: 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND' }
```
on google
google
```js
npm install hexo --no-optional
```


```js
npm uninstall hexo
npm install hexo --no-optional
```


hexodtrace-prodiderhexo


hexo-cli:
```js
npm uninstall hexo-cli -g
npm install hexo-cli -g
```

Post.title: AngularJS:select
Post._content:
[](http://gejiawen.github.io/)

---

select AngularJS directiveAngularJS [AngularJS:select](http://docs.angularjs.org/api/ng.directive:select)

selectngOptionngRepeatArrayObject





## Controller

```js

function selectCtrl($scope) {
    $scope.selected = '';

    $scope.model = [{
        id: 10001,
        mainCategory: '',
        productName: 'T',
        productColor: ''
    }, {
        id: 10002,
        mainCategory: '',
        productName: '',
        productColor: ''
    }, {
        id: 10003,
        mainCategory: '',
        productName: '',
        productColor: ''
    }];
}

```

## 
### 
usage:
label for value in array

```js
<select ng-model="selected" ng-options="m.productName for m in model">
    <option value="">--  --</option>
</select>
```


usage
label for value in array
```js
<select ng-model="selected" ng-options="(m.productColor + ' - ' + m.productName) for m in model">
    <option value="">--  --</option>
</select>
```


usage
label group by groupName for value in array
```js
<select ng-model="selected" ng-options="(m.productColor + ' - ' + m.productName) group by m.mainCategory for m in model">
    <option value="">--  --</option>
</select>
```

ngModel
usage
select as label for value in array
```js
<select ng-model="selected" ng-options="m.id as m.productName for m in model">
    <option value="">--  --</option>
</select>
```
